author: Lesley Waters
method: For the bacon butty, heat a griddle pan, add the streaky bacon and cook until crisp. Set aside. Drizzle two slices of ciabatta with olive oil and then chargrill on both sides in the same pan in which you cooked the bacon. For the mustard mayo, mix together the yoghurt, cream, mustard, lemon juice, salt and freshly ground black pepper in a bowl. To serve, pile the bacon onto the griddled ciabatta. Spoon over a generous dollop of mayo and place the other slice of griddled bread on top.
